name: AvailabilityCalendar.com
tag_list: availability-calendar, booking-calendar, bookings, reservation, calendar, availability
overview:
Create, manage and publish availability calendars for your website.

If you rent something out and want to show your visitors if your property or good is available or booked you need an availability calendar. AvailabilityCalendar.com can help you with this.

With AvailabilityCalendar.com you can create and publish availability calendars and include them on your website. All of this with a few clicks. You don’t need to know anything about FTP, CSS, or databases.

You can embed your availability calendar on any website, whether you have a (open source) CMS (content management system) or not. You can generate embed codes that can be pasted on your webpage. You can publish an availability calendar directly on your webpage or you can link to a blank page / pop-up that has the availability calendar on it.
